Comments_List: By taking this course, I developed a lot of knowledge on how to deal with different situations that might occur during archaeological fieldwork.

Skills regarding planning and executing one's own excavation for research
survey skills 
documentation
development of research and execution of specialists
The professor has organised the course in a very engaging way that each class was interesting and fruitful.

Really great course regarding actual examples of on-site excavation
Interaction with specialists of different kinds that work on these excavations 
Interaction and open-discussion regarding excavation issues and problems

Maybe more hands-on experience with a mock planning of an excavation
Yes, I would definately recommend taking this course for graduate students, who will be organizing their fieldwork in the future.
Yes; Very good for getting first hand accounts of issues faced during actual excavations, and an opportunity to learn how to nominate a potential site for UNESCO or World Heritage.
